effect.sun_moon: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises user’s Defense by one stage. After this move is used, the power of ice ball and rollout are doubled until the user leaves the field.

short_effect.sun_moon: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.
